fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Beggar: You draw 3 base cards at the end of every phase.
- Premonition: You will learn if there is only one Chaos member left.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Deranged: Draw a random card. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Hound: Learn if someone is true Chaos. [1 use, Unique, UOR2]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see Order win the game, however at least (Order Members * 0.75) of them must be dead by the end.
